subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: One day after punching A. J. Pierzynski of the White Sox to set off a melee, Michael Barrett hit a game-tying triple in the eighth inning as part of the Cubs' rally.
snippet: One day after punching A. J. Pierzynski of the White Sox to set off a melee, Michael Barrett hit a game-tying triple in the eighth inning as part of the Cubs' rally.
